name: Loaded Mash Potatoes
author: Melissa Goff
summary: Swanson® Unsalted Chicken Stock is combined with potatoes, low-fat sour cream and a low-sodium ranch mix and topped with turkey bacon. You won't miss any of the flavor in this healthier version of mashed potatoes.
ingredients: 5 pounds russet potatoes, peeled and diced
1 (32 ounce) carton Swanson® Unsalted Chicken Stock
¼ cup low-sodium dry ranch dressing mix
¾ cup shredded nonfat Cheddar cheese
directions: Cook turkey bacon in a skillet over medium heat to desired crispness; crumble
In a large stock pot, combine potatoes and Swanson® Unsalted Chicken Broth
Boil potatoes and broth for about until potatoes are soft, stirring occasionally, 15 to 20 minutes
Add sour cream and ranch seasoning mix
Beat potatoes with a mixer or a mashing utensil until potatoes are mashed to desired consistency and ingredients are well combined, 2 or 3 minutes
Stir in bacon, Cheddar cheese, and chives
